Message.Name: work.perfect
Message.Text: She must be perfect at this.

Message.Name: work.ok
Message.Text: She made a few mistakes but overall she is okay at this.
She made a few mistakes but overall she is an okay ${job-title}.

Message.Name: work.bad
Message.Text: She was nervous and made a few mistakes. She isn't that good at this.

Message.Name: work.worst
Message.Text: She was nervous and constantly making mistakes. She really isn't any good at this job.
